definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Cover and boil 3 to 5 minutes longer or until crisp-tender.
sentences.chinese: 再蓋鍋煮3到5分鐘或更長直到變得清脆細嫩。

sentences.english: Using it for a long period will make your skin smooth, soft, moistened and white.
sentences.chinese: 長期使用能使肌膚光滑細嫩，水嫩透白。

sentences.english: Huating succulent beef tender, nutrient-rich, delicate elastic cortex.
sentences.chinese: 華亭肉牛肉質細嫩，營養豐富，皮質細膩彈性好。

sentences.english: She has that creamy, smooth skin—and that laugh! It's like music.
sentences.chinese: 他的皮膚是如此的光滑細嫩，就像是一首流暢的樂曲。

sentences.english: Weleda Calendula Face Cream protects and cares for your baby's delicate facial skin.
sentences.chinese: 金盞花面部保溼霜保護和關懷寶寶細嫩的面部肌膚。

sentences.english: Brown color, shiny red meat, dry and delicate post, its flavor sweet and rich.
sentences.chinese: 色澤褐紅油亮，肉後乾結細嫩，其味香甜濃郁。

sentences.english: The eagle dug its sharp claws into my tender flesh.
sentences.chinese: 老鷹將他尖利的爪子扎進我細嫩的肉裏。

sentences.english: after just one use, skin feels softer and looks clearer.
sentences.chinese: 僅僅使用一次之後，皮膚會細嫩潔淨很多。

sentences.english: Hats are equally important in protecting your face from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 遮陽帽則讓太陽的強光，在你細嫩面部之外顯示剛烈。

sentences.english: The skin around your eyes is naturally thin and delicate.
sentences.chinese: 眼周的皮膚本就很細嫩。

sentences.english: Care of delicate and easy to produce fine lines and eye cream specially developed flash management.
sentences.chinese: 呵護細嫩並易產生細紋的眼部而專門開發的閃理眼霜。

sentences.english: Do away with the thin Crease of neck.
sentences.chinese: 去除頸部細紋，令肌膚緊緻細嫩。

sentences.english: Diminishes the appearance of fine lines for dramatically younger-looking hands.
sentences.chinese: 減少光滑細嫩的雙手的皺紋的出現。

sentences.english: It's delicately flavored white meat, very buttery," said the book.
sentences.chinese: 書中稱，“這種魚味道很好，屬於細嫩多汁的白肉”。

sentences.english: Tender, and no meat stimulation mud gamey smell.
sentences.chinese: 肉青白細嫩，且無泥腥氣。

definition: mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
